channel.title: Comments on: Finding Joy in the Grind

item.title: By: KittenKiller
item.dc:creator: KittenKiller
item.description:
We have quite a few rogues in our guild. Perhaps I shall pass these usefull tips along.
Thanks guys,
KK
item.content:encoded:
We have quite a few rogues in our guild. Perhaps I shall pass these usefull tips along.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Good call, Puhase. I'm a big fan of crippling poison myself, haven't tried the caster-grief poison combo yet but I will this weekend for sure.
item.content:encoded: Good call, Puhase. I’m a big fan of crippling poison myself, haven’t tried the caster-grief poison combo yet but I will this weekend for sure.

item.title: By: Puhase
item.dc:creator: Puhase
item.description:
This one is particular to WSG and AB, mostly due to the decreased chance of getting mowed down by 15 people at once.
My favorite thing to do is to go Crippling poison mainhand, mindnumbing poison offhand and then sprint around putting it on the mages. And just moving on to another person, leaving them there to wallow in their deabilitated misery. In my experience, depoisoning just doesn't happen in BG's and these guys have just about nothing they can do once this has gone down. I've seen mages get so frustrated with that combo of poisons they just suicide themselves into a warrior just to resurrect without that on them.
item.content:encoded:
This one is particular to WSG and AB, mostly due to the decreased chance of getting mowed down by 15 people at once.

My favorite thing to do is to go Crippling poison mainhand, mindnumbing poison offhand and then sprint around putting it on the mages. And just moving on to another person, leaving them there to wallow in their deabilitated misery. In my experience, depoisoning just doesn’t happen in BG’s and these guys have just about nothing they can do once this has gone down. I’ve seen mages get so frustrated with that combo of poisons they just suicide themselves into a warrior just to resurrect without that on them.
